an6.78:4.1: “Mendicants, when a mendicant has six things they’re full of joy and happiness in the present life, and they have laid the groundwork for ending the defilements.
an6.78:4.3: It’s when a mendicant enjoys the teaching, meditation, giving up, seclusion, harmlessness, and non-proliferation.
an6.78:4.4: When a mendicant has these six things they’re full of joy and happiness in the present life, and they have laid the groundwork for ending the defilements.”
